description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called HomeShell, which serves as the main layout for a citizen engagement platform. It includes a navigation rail, app bar, drawer, and placeholder content, managing navigation between different sections of the app.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the main layout shell of the application, including navigation and placeholder content.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: The state class managing the navigation index, layout, and routing logic for HomeShell.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for HomeShell widget.

methods.name: _navItem
methods.description: Helper method to create navigation rail destinations with an icon and label.

methods.name: _buildLeftNav
methods.description: Builds the left-side NavigationRail with destination icons and routing logic.

methods.name: _placeholderPanel
methods.description: Creates placeholder content panel with title, subtitle, and decorative cards.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method rendering the overall scaffold with app bar, drawer, navigation, and content.
